mean_en: a view of a wide area of land; a description, study or set of pictures that presents all the different aspects or stages of a particular subject, event, etc.
sentence: This panorama shows the entire downtown skyline.
sentence_trans: 这张全景显示了整个城市的天际线。
word_etyma: pan广泛的 + orama视力 → 广泛视力范围所及的 → panorama全景，全貌
